message: Let's be fair and divide the money in a way that we both get a good amount. I'll take 60 and you can have 40.
Your offer was a bit unbalanced. Let's split the difference and ensure a more even distribution.
Considering the decreasing value of money for me, I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share than initially proposed. Let's meet closer to the middle with 52 for me and 48 for you.
Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.
